name: Photography
description: The art of capturing moments through the lens of a camera, focusing on composition, lighting, and subject.

name: Gardening
description: The practice of growing and cultivating plants as part of horticulture, often for aesthetic, recreational, or nutritional purposes.

name: Cooking
description: The skill or process of preparing food by combining, mixing, and heating ingredients to create meals and dishes.

name: Hiking
description: Walking long distances in natural environments, typically on trails or paths, for recreational and fitness purposes.

name: Painting
description: The practice of applying pigment to a surface such as canvas, wood, paper, or a wall to create an artwork.

name: Cycling
description: The activity of riding a bicycle for recreation, sport, or transportation, often enjoyed on roads or trails.

name: Reading
description: The act of interpreting written or printed words and symbols to understand and derive meaning from them, often for enjoyment or education.

name: Knitting
description: A method of creating fabric by interlocking loops of yarn with needles, commonly used to make garments and accessories.

name: Traveling
description: The act of exploring new places and experiencing different cultures, landscapes, and cuisines, often for leisure or adventure.

name: Fishing
description: The activity of catching fish, either for food, sport, or recreation, using various techniques and equipment.

name: Woodworking
description: The craft of creating objects from wood, including furniture, sculptures, and other decorative or functional items.

name: Yoga
description: A practice that combines physical postures, breathing exercises, and meditation to promote physical and mental well-being.
